channel.title: CVE Feed for Alex Raven -- WP Report Post
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alex Raven -- WP Report Post

item.title: CVE-2023-34168|2024-08-02T16:01:54.217Z -- alex%20raven -- wp%20report%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Alex Raven WP Report Post allows SQL Injection.This issue affects WP Report Post: from n/a through 2.1.2.
